ctx: intros a b p q H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: unfold eqT, eqP, n, zeroP, plusTerm.
exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce eqP to an evaluable reference.

ctx: intros a b p q H1 H2.
intros a b p q H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce plusP to an evaluable reference.

ctx: intros a b p q H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: The reference H3 was not found in the current environment.

original: intros a b p q H1 H2. unfold eqT, eqP, n, zeroP, plusTerm. intros H3 H4. unfold pluspf, plusP. rewrite H3. reflexivity.
